name: Macerated Stone Fruit
keywords: almonds, dried fruit, orange juice, fall
recipeIngredient: 2 pound dried fruit stone fruit (apricots, plums or cherries, for example)
1 tablespoon anise liquor or 2 or 3 star anise (optional)

recipeInstructions.text: Mix fruit, almonds, pine nuts, orange juice, water, cinnamon, rosewater and  anise liquor or 2 or 3 star anise, if using.
Cover and stir every few hours for 12 to 24 hours. Serve when fruit is tender.
